title: [K-12] Strategic Pricing Decisions and Value Creation: Experience-Based Simulation Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Economics Concepts and Business Model Comprehension
context.additional_context: Small-Group Learning Environment Using Smartphone-Based VR Simulation Tools. Maximizing Learning Outcomes Through Simplified Business Case Scenarios

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the impact of pricing on consumer perception and value under various market conditions
Learners can design optimal pricing strategies through value chain mapping in resource-constrained environments
Learners enhance their ability to solve real-world business problems through decision-making simulations that account for loss aversion psychology

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
